description: printed in black; six scenes: monk on a ladder addressing Christ on the cross, monk listening to a woman giving confession, poor family putting coin into monk’s cup, eating monk with a woman seated on his lap, monk with a kingly figure standing on his back, monk giving sermon accompanied by two demons; received framed
